function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of Hamiltonian Monte Carlo (HMC) sampler","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased posterior samples","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough validation and cross-validation of the model","Technologies":"HMC diagnostics and validation techniques","People":"Data scientists, statisticians","Owner":"Data science team"},{"Description":"Lag between deaths and infections in data interpretation","Impact":"Potential misinterpretation of epidemic trends","Mitigation":"Proper consideration of lag and its impact on predictions","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling and trend analysis","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Public health research team"},{"Description":"Slowing of Rt in response to major interventions","Impact":"Misinterpretation of model-driven predictions","Mitigation":"Data-driven validation of the slowing trend and consideration of model assumptions","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling and trend analysis","People":"Epidemiologists, policy makers","Owner":"Public health and policy research teams"}]}
